title: Takelings House Party
notes: Steam shows Mostly Positive (79% of 298). SteamDB shows 73.24% positive; blended mid‑70s.
raw_comment: 1 VR player attempts to exterminate the pesky takelings that have invaded his house. 1VR player vs up to 8 local players or AI. Up to 8 gamepads. Phones as controllers. Shared screen + 1 VR .
